item.title: [718]CaliScape Enhanced
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

CaliScapeEnhanced:

CaliScape’s skilling is challenging as skillcapes are not just “given” to players. Players on CaliScape enjoy a good challenging skill and while skills aren’t too hard, they still take some time to complete.

I wasn’t saying that you don’t have good skills, I hope I didn’t come off that way. I was just saying I didn’t see any images for skilling :).

Also, still need that xp rate

Read full topic

item.title: [718]CaliScape Enhanced
item.dc:creator: @CaliScapeEnhanced CaliScapeEnhanced
item.description:
@CaliScapeEnhanced wrote:

Download clients are expected in the near future as well as many other things. As I’ve previously stated, CaliScape has just become a live server on the 17th of May. In the short time we’ve been up, we have managed to make our way to RuneLocus’s 2nd page Top Server List. Join today! CaliScape is the next big thing!

Read full topic

item.title: [718]CaliScape Enhanced
item.dc:creator: @CaliScapeEnhanced CaliScapeEnhanced
item.description:
@CaliScapeEnhanced wrote:

south-park:

Looks like a normal 718.

CaliScape is run quite differently than most other 718’s. We have a solid staff base with root admins that know what they are doing and are always updating the game with new minigames. We have an excellent eco system. CaliScape has been running since 2007, so we have a great player base of knowledgeable players that offer a great game experience. We plan to be releasing a 317 server soon as well to help the community grow in many aspects. If you are a fan of Minecraft, Caliscape also offers a minecraft server. Hope this helps you in your decision on whether or not to join CaliScape!

Read full topic
